text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) HKUDS/DeepTutor | 95% | stars now 6827 → est 12944 (range 12901-12987)
   https://github.com/HKUDS/DeepTutor
2) AnmolSaini16/mapcn | 92% | stars now 3906 → est 7306 (range 7269-7343)
   https://github.com/AnmolSaini16/mapcn
3) ChrisWiles/claude-code-showcase | 92% | stars now 1108 → est 7816 (range 7791-7841)
   https://github.com/ChrisWiles/claude-code-showcase
4) ophub/fnnas | 92% | stars now 695 → est 4394 (range 4369-4419)
   https://github.com/ophub/fnnas
5) jarrodwatts/claude-hud | 92% | stars now 1703 → est 4264 (range 4239-4289)
   https://github.com/jarrodwatts/claude-hud

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
